description:
Precondition: - More than one floating IP address is associated with the instance.

If I terminate the instance, it should disassociate all floating ip addresses.

Actual Result: Only one floating IP address is disassociated.
title: Terminate instance: disassociates only one floating ip address

comments.content:
Precondition: - More than one floating IP address is associated with the instance.

If I terminate the instance, it should disassociate all floating ip addresses.

Actual Result: Only one floating IP address is disassociated.
comments.author: https://api.launchpad.net/1.0/~tpatil

comments.content: Yes, terminate_instance (nova/compute/manager.py) uses instance_get_floating_address (nova/db/sqlalchemy/api.py) which only returns one floating address.
comments.author: https://api.launchpad.net/1.0/~ttx
